titleStmt.title: Maister Basse his careere, or, The New hunting of the hare, to a new court tune. The Faulconers hunting, to the tune of Basse his careere
titleStmt.author: Basse, William, d. ca. 1653.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Basse by STC (2nd ed.).
Bound and filmed as two leaves. STC (2nd ed.) treats as single item.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
